Product Description

ORIFLAME LOVE POTION EAU DE PARFUM 50ML The house of Oriflame offers their first aphrodisiac perfume Love Potion as the embodiment of seduction. Perfect to increase desire and passion and to stimulate game of seduction in hot summer! The fragrance possesses an oriental character and is based on two main ingredients known as aphrodisiacs - ginger and chocolate. Sensuality and sensitivity of the scent is provided by ginger and spices from India. It continues with exotic aromas of slightly sweet cocoa flowers fresh tangerine tender lily and vanilla. The whole tempting and warm composition is rounded up by tonka beans and sandalwood. Accompanying products in this seductive fragrant collection include Gel for intimate moments Love Potion and Massage Oil Love Potion. The first one is a gentle moisturizing gel that helps restore balance to your sensitive areas. It helps you relax. Available as 75 ml. The latter is scented oil ideal for sensual massage with Love Potion. Seductive elixir of ginger cocoa and chocolate flowers awakes your senses and enchants. Available as 250 ml. Colors of this edition are red color of passion and mysterious black.

column15: Buy Hugo Boss No 1 for Men  100ml at lowest price in India on Amazon.in. Check out Hugo Boss No 1 for Men  100ml reviews  ratings  features  specifications and browse more Beauty products online at best prices on Amazon.in.
column17:
Product Description

His husky baritone invokes memories of a memorable night and the authority that he radiates sends people scurrying to do his bidding. Assuming power comes easily to him for he a born leader. He demands only the best not only from people around him but also from his own self pushing hard and further into the boundaries of possibility to achieve what no man has achieved yet. His slow yet steady climb into the creme de la creme of society and power is not without its scars ones that are well-hidden by the overwhelming presence of Number One from the celebrated house of Boss. The luxury Eau de Toilette is like a seductive companion who wraps her silken fingers over his heart and soul and keeps him enslaved to its wrenching aroma. Accords of artemisia green apple juniper basil grapefruit caraway bergamot and lemon create a luminous opening which bursts his day wide open in a flurry of freshness. Notes in the heart blend accords of honey lavender orris root jasmine sage with the floral tones of lily of the valley rose and geranium which instigates action and strength within him during a packed day. The dry down departs and leaves behind a trail with the accords of sandalwood amber patchouli musk oakmoss cedar and tobacco with just a hint of spicy cinnamon. The allure of Hugo Boss Number One is presented to world in a simple flacon through which the clear amber of the fragrance peeks out proving yet again that the most potent things come in the most innocuous of packages. Feel yourself go heady as the sweeping notes of Boss Number One takes over your senses.

The fragrance evokes the grandeur of Indian jewelry and colorful dresses inspired by the flower bazaar at the Lake Dal in Kashmir. The perfumer Christian Vermorel evokes the fascinating and surreal atmosphere of this place in northwestern India filled with flavors of many flowers mixed with the nearby scents of spices and fruits. Vanilla used in this fragrance is supplied by EARF (Eco-Agri Research Foundation) a nonprofit organization that helps Indian farmers. The composition opens with luscious notes of cinnamon lemon peach and plum. Flower bouquet in the heart is made of Indian jasmine freesia orange blossom and lily of the valley laid on the base of vanilla musk sandalwood and benzoin.

Product Description

ORIFLAME VOYAGER The new male fragrance from the house of Oriflame arrives in June 2011. The fragrance is envisioned as an escape from everyday life an adventurous olfactory journey composed of unique ingredients brought from Namibia. The fragrance is inspired by the culture of the Himba people. It relieves your feelings and desires to explore the new horizons of Africa or some other places close to your heart. This masculine and dynamic fragrance will awaken your senses and inspire you to move your limits do something irrational unforeseen and exciting. Voyageris offered in a powerful and stable glass bottle in which it blends its flavors and tempts with its shades of amber. In the top notes of the Voyager composition you will feel the citrusy juices of bergamot and mandarin which are there to refresh and offer a burst of sweetness. The heart is a hypnotic blend of cardamom green tea and myrrh from Namibia laid on a warm and comfortable base of amber vetiver and creamy sandalwood. The nomadic Himba people of Namibia collected the myrrh one of the main ingredients in the composition of the masculine scented Voyager.

Product Description

ORIFLAME ULTRA GLAM EAU DE TOILETTE 30ML Ultra Glam is a playful fragrance of oriental fruity and vanilla character intended for modern young women who love fashion and glamorous parties. This fragrance is described as their weapon of seduction. The composition blends notes of star anise bergamot and pink grapefruit at the top with the heart of orange blossom jasmine tea and heliotrope and the base of benzoin sandalwood praline and organic vanilla.

Hugo XY Hugo Boss for men.Hugo XY by Hugo Boss is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Top notes are pear leaf cedar and bergamot; middle notes are basil and mint; base notes are patchouli musk and cedar.
